fields.summary: Developed a Highly Scalable Web App using Microservices . Using Python Django and AngularJS
Build a Heads Up Display for JCB machine Excavator. Used Python as language,VFD display and RaspberryPi Microcontroller
"SMART INVESTMENT" or doing stock price prediction by seeing the closing and opening price of shares of a company
Build a personalized Virtual Assistant for an electronic band which reduces keyboard and mouse operations respectively. Something like Cortana or Siri !! I build "Iris"
